body_html:
Your companies proxy is probably getting in the way. Try setting HTTP_PROXY and HTTPS_PROXY, either in your IDE or Global settings. For windows this is:
System Properties-> Advanced -> Environment Variables -> System variables -> New System Variable. You'll need to get the address and port from your IT team.

body:
Your companies proxy is probably getting in the way. Try setting HTTP_PROXY and HTTPS_PROXY, either in your IDE or Global settings. For windows this is: 
System Properties-> Advanced -> Environment Variables -> System variables -> New System Variable.  You'll need to get the address and port from your IT team.
